page.syntax: Variable as A = CLIPBOARD.Get_Data([N cb_type|C cb_typeName[,C options]])

argument.name: cb_type|C
argument.description: A number that specifies the type of data in the Clipboard. Valid values for Clipboard_Format are:

page.discussion: The CLIPBOARD.GET_DATA() method gets data from the clipboard and stores it in Variable. The type of data retrieved from the clipboard is determined by Clipboard_Format. You can register a new Clipboard_Format value with the CLIPBOARD.REGISTER_TYPE() method. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script puts the record into change mode and writes data from the clipboard into the account_number field.
